page.title: 10Housing-Grundisburgh
page.content: Housing Types:451 Households of which 257 are Owner Occipier,116 Council Housing,42 Rented, 24 Tied. There are no Sheltered or Multiple Dwellings. Development: There is an expressed need for increased housing stock to include property for "First Time Buyers", "Medium or Family" homes, "Cottages", "House for the Elderly", and "Council Housing". There is little expressed demand for "Large" housing. Development Sites: There is little expressed need for development within the village; development should take place on the outskirts, with some suitable "in filling". Types of Development:There was an ex- pressed opposition to "Estate Develop- ment","Town Type Dwellings",and "Industrial Development"; there was also an expressed need to provide more opportunities for local employment.
